title: Sonam Kapoor Isn’t Letting Go Of The Cold Shoulder Trend, As Spotted In The Capital Last Night
text:
facebook 
Last night, Airbnb and designer duo, Shantanu and Nikhil collaborated for a fashion show in New Delhi. Present at this shindig was actress/style icon Sonam Kapoor who, despite a brief appearance, made two very resounding spring statements. Ready? Ready! 
So... cold-shoulders are still hot for spring, and sleek hair isn’t just another celebrity phase. Dressed in a black, off-the-shoulder Self Portrait dress - featuring a lace hem - the actress worked her middle-parted bun with dramatic eyes and a nude lip. Finishing the look were her personality heels, from Aquazzura. 
Of course, this flawless look has been styled by sister, Rhea Kapoor. The sisterhood has spoken – all version of the cold shoulder haven’t been cancelled yet. And, here’s how you can wear the trend this summer. Picture Credits : Viral Bhayani, Pallav Palliwal
